snippet: American Ballet Theater and the Segerstrom Center for the Arts in Costa Mesa, Calif., will open the American Ballet Theater William J. Gillespie School on the Segerstrom campus in September, both organizations announced on Tuesday.
abstract: American Ballet Theater and the Segerstrom Center for the Arts in Costa Mesa, Calif., will open the American Ballet Theater William J. Gillespie School on the Segerstrom campus in September, both organizations announced on Tuesday.

headline.main: American Ballet Theater and Segerstrom Center in California to Open Ballet School
